<denchmark-h:h2>üêõ Bug</denchmark-h>
Possible swapped height and width in random_crop_size_generator. In code size[0] is used for width and size[1] for height
kornia/kornia/augmentation/random_generator/random_generator.py
Line 367 in c77e62c
cond = ((0 < h) * (h < size[1]) * (0 < w) * (w < size[0])).int()
But in doc it's the other way around:
kornia/kornia/augmentation/augmentation.py
Lines 756 to 757 in c77e62c
size (Tuple[int, int]): Desired output size (out_h, out_w) of each edge.
Must be Tuple[int, int], then out_h = size[0], out_w = size[1].

comments.comment: That is a typo. Thanks for reporting. Will fix that soon.
